alert.note: Alert for Florence; Georgetown; Horry; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:30PM EDT until April 05 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FLORENCE...NORTHERN GEORGETOWN...SOUTHWESTERN HORRY...SOUTH CENTRAL MARION AND NORTHEASTERN WILLIAMSBURG COUNTIES... At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Outland, or 21 miles west of Murrells Inlet, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Conway, Red Hill, Socastee, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Rhems, Warsaw, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Bucksville, Pee Dee Crossroads, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Bucksport, Dongola, Outland, Yauhannah, Coastal Carolina University, Morrisville, Henry and Oatland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
